description:
Take a look back at what`s come before, as the former members of Spearhead get ready for their most deadly mission yet.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Si cela vaut la peine de mourir
Special Edition "Shishite Kai Aru Mono Nareba"
Special Edition: If There`s Something Worth Dying For
Special Edition「死して甲斐あるものなれば」
